articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: How to encrypt your PC’s disk without giving the keys to Microsoft - Ars Technica
articles.description: Storing recovery keys with Microsoft allows the company to unlock your disk.

articles.author: Russell Brandom
articles.title: Anthropic launches interactive Claude apps, including Slack and other workplace tools - TechCrunch
articles.description: Claude users will now be able to call up interactive apps inside the chatbot interface, with Cowork integration coming soon.
articles.content:
Claude users will now be able to call up interactive apps within the chatbot interface, thanks to a new feature announced by Anthropic on Monday.
